data.title: “No one owns Internet... so, it should be open and accessible to everyone,” says the Chairman of the Telecom Regulatory Authority of India.

95-yr-old Australian wife of a UN diplomat probed for allegedly looting Middle Eastern artifacts - The artifacts are worth over EGP 13 million, including a funeral mask from an Egyptian mummy, Neolithic axe heads dating back 40,000 yrs, Roman weapons, coins & jewelry from ancient Egypt.
